website_summaries.verdict: A quiet, filter-free humidifier that works for up to 50 hours thanks to a 6 liter tank – the largest we looked at.
pros: We love the large tank and high mist output
The blue LED nightlight can be shut off
Comes with an essential oil tray for adding a fragrance to the generous mist
cons: The tank can get slippery during refills
Some owners have reported cracks and leaks in the plastic

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent purchase I’ve bought a few humidifiers this is the one
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier hands-down is the best one I’ve bought so far it functions well without any hiccups and the cherry on top is it’s massive volume so I don’t have to fill it as frequently
customer_reviews.author: SmokingChicken

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to upgrade from your old humidifier I recommend this unit, you can adjust the intensity and it lasts for quite a while before you have to refill it again. The essential oil tray is good for a light scent (nice for small children) and you can turn the led off. So far the unit is very quiet with only the occasional gurgle. And it comes with a 2 year warranty. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have actually bought two of these units now, as I really liked the one and needed another. My first one has started making a funny noise, but it still works ok. I would definitely buy this one again, it is easy to clean and the tank doesn't get slimy if you don't clean it daily, once a week works great, just like the instructions say. I really like this one, mainly because it doesn't use a ton of water on the lowest setting, but it still has enough "steam" coming out. Others I have tried go through a full tank a night, as you can't adjust the flow low enough. Definitely worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: SHays

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Super easy to fill, extremely quiet! So quiet the baby is sleeping right by it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of the old cool mist humidifiers for years, and lived with the god awful mess of the filters, and the noise, and the so-so performance in my master bedroom. I can't say how pleased and surprised I am at this product's performance thus far. It is very nearly silent, requires no filters (seriously, are those things disgusting and annoying to replace or what?), and I could tell the difference almost immediately. I also like the essential oils drawer; still messing with how much to actually put into the thing to get the right result. The water tank is plenty for a full 24 hours of run time and refilling it is super easy. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just a great humidifier! We got the black one so it doesn’t stand out grabbing your attention. Scented oils are a very nice touch! At 1 1/2 gallons it can run for a day or two depending on your settings and it is unbelievably quite!! If the operation light wasn’t on or you couldn’t see the mist, you’d never know it was running!!! I gave high grades for cleaning and durability but have not really had it long enough to qualify those stars although I believe they will stand the test of time!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my bedroom to help with sinus congestion. This thing is powerful. I cranked it up to high and woke up to 58% humidity, which makes you wake up feeling like you inhaled water. Turned it to low and got 49%, which ended up being about perfect. It can run for about 3-4 nights on low and the oil diffuser works well if you put enough oil in it. If you're getting this for the same reason I did I would recommend getting a digital humidity gauge. They cost less than $10 and will let you figure out what level of humidity works best for you. I wake up feeling the least congested in the 48-50% range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Finally a machine with a robust output. I was able to humidify a medium size room to 45% RH in one hour. Tried two other machines from the local pharmacy/retail store with no luck The only complaint I have is with the operator manual. 'Fill it up/Plug it in' and the usual disclaimers about safety. I found more useful product feature information in Amazon like the auto shut off and LED night light. I use only distilled water to avoid scaling up the machine and the dreaded white mineral powder on the furniture. A good find!!
customer_reviews.author: Worshipguitar

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this humidifier. Used it a lot during the long, very cold spell we've had. It did help replace some of the moisture lost by the hot air furnace running so much. The tank is large and held enough water for a day and a half with the dial set at mid level. I was happy with the low noise level, and it didn't disturb my sleep when used in the bedroom. I have some essential oils and it was nice to be able to use them with this humidifier, since most don't allow adding scents.. Didn't have any problem with the table getting wet around the humidifier. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ballenger

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier, Great Difusser
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic humidifier. My living room is approximately 350 sq ft with very high ceilings and this humidifier was able to change the room humidity from 29 to 34 according to my nest thermostat in about three hours. I also used the diffuser and it also works perfectly. I read other reviewers say that the scent given off only lasts for a little while. Well I still have the scent spilling out of the humidifier three hours later. I really think it has to do with the quality of the oils not this humidifier. It's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Colclasure

customer_reviews.title: Large reservoir and doesn't double as a night light
customer_reviews.text: It's a big humidifier with an analog dial for mist settings and no extra decorative lights, which makes it ideal for my space. It all fits solidly together and seems well constructed. I can't speak to the essential oils part because I hadn't really intended to use it for that. Overall I'm totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: emaletk

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you turn it on, it works. It's very quiet, with the exception of the occasional glub/knock of water filling a void. The Essential Oil diffuser is easy to use and works well. The large tank lasts nearly all week with continuous night time usage (I don't run it during the day, but do 10+ hours at night). The humidifier made an immediate difference in our room, not only diffusing the oil but drastically increasing the humidity. My sleeping improved immediately and I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a new humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: James White

customer_reviews.title: This is the best humidifier I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best humidifier I've ever purchased. Puts out a nice heavy spray (scented if you purchase the scents pack, which I recommend). If you fill it, it lasts through the night and more. I now breathe easier because of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is silent. There is a place for essential oils but I haven’t used that yet. It has definitely helped the dryness in the House. Large tank keeps it running about 24 hours before you need to add more water, and it has an automatic shut off when the water is gone. There is no built in filter, so if you don't have filtered water out of the tap, use distilled water or you will get white dust. If you use distilled water, there is no problem Love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Quite, puts out a lot of vapor
customer_reviews.text: It's quite, puts out a lot of vapor, i can get my room to 55% relative humidity. I bought this to help relieve some sinus conjestion / allergies I've been having. It does seem to open me up when I'm awake, I still get conjested when I sleep though with the humidifier on. I've tried the aroma tray, I can't really smell any difference so not sure if it's actually working, I have a regular difuser anyway. If you live in a cold environment this will cut down your heating cost by keeping the humidity high inside, it will feel very warm and you won't need to run your heater as much.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, works great--- just the antidote for dry air when the fireplace is roaring
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Loomis

customer_reviews.title: I really like this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I really like this humidifier. It does what the advertising says it does. It does not need filters, so I don't have to worry about constantly having to replace filters. It has a large water capacity, so it will go a few nights before I need to fill it again. I appreciate that there is an oil tray, as it is really nice to have that hint of calming scent in my room aiding in my relaxation. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this and seem to be missing the valve for the tank so when I try to fill it water spills every where. Otherwise I would have liked it. Can anyone help? Am I doing something wrong? Thanks. Update: quick response with instructions to access fill valve. Quiet, smells and looks great. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Franzi

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's working quite well. I bought 2 , one for the living room, and one for the bedroom. I have a cat who gets dry skin in the winter, from the dry heat in my apt. I also bought 2 digital indoor humidity gages that give current and average readings , and the humidity has been in the acceptable range. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett

customer_reviews.title: My favorite humidifier ever!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully built! Love the modern and sleek design. This is so easy to youe and clean. I put 4 drops of oil on the sponge yesterday and i can still semi smell the oil. It’s refreshing. The low mist option puts off a lot more than i expected. Perfect for my dry skin and my sons medical issues. We run humidifiers nonstop. Will definitely purchase again! Super quiet too. I placed mine in the central-most location of my house. To add moisture to the most rooms possible.
customer_reviews.author: AutismMom13

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Breaks in 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Mistakenly bought 3 times. Yes I am an idiot. Great size tank but the damn thing always fails. Always. After 2 months ***COMPLETE GARBAGE*** Avoid at all cost.
customer_reviews.author: McBastard

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic will break and leak after a month even with proper use and distilled water.
customer_reviews.text: Totally cheap flimsy plastic that cracked after a month (just after return window) and leaked all over my floor. It worked okay until it cracked. I did not drop it, I used distilled water, I did not use any essential oils. Do not buy this product. It is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: david panter

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.  Puts out a lot of mist, which is what I need whenr my wood stove is going.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had it 1 week and bought my son one too for his house. No noise at all except an occasional gurgle. Gets rid of full tank in one day at full speed. Easy to refill and clean. Someone said the warranted is lifetime but not sure. Shoots a mist about 18 inches high and doesn't get anything around it damp. Even within 12 inches of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Planner27

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this humidifier for 2 months non stop and it continues to perform beautifully. I do recommend to adhere to the manufacturers recommendation of using distilled water. I used filtered water a couple of times and found a film around the base of the motorized unit that sits on the base. Although filtered, still had some hard water stains. (My fault )Otherwise excellent.
customer_reviews.author: tammy johnson

customer_reviews.title: design is flawed
customer_reviews.text: Well it seems to work, and I'm not having any leaking issues like some. I do have hard water, so am seeing the white film it seems all ultrasonic humidifiers are prone to. But there are a couple design issues which are annoying. The top is difficult to remove to access the handle for carrying, it needs tabs or a lip to grasp to pull them off. So I just don't bother getting a tool to pry them off. And no handle for carrying while full upside down makes it cumbersome to flip back over to set on the base, and while holding it under faucet to fill.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars - U[date
customer_reviews.text: Does what it claims. Update: I have owned this for 3 1/2 months. I always fee responsible to write followups since I have been fooled by "I just got it and it's great!" reviews. This is an excellent product. I love it. It is now also serving as a quasi-swamp cooler with my good tower fan in the room too. Keeps me out of being disappointed about a more expensive and not that much better room air conditioner as I have owned also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to Fill
customer_reviews.text: Boy this thing is the worst to fill up. You have to take the whole tank off, and fill it up upside down, then put it back on again. Water gets everywhere. You can't just set it in the sink to fill because of this weird top part that makes it not flat. It's really quiet though, does its job well. And truly the way you have to fill it up is SUCH a hassle, if it had a top-fill option then I would've given it 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not as promissed
customer_reviews.text: The oil diffuser was the main reason for the purchase, it doesn't work although I have tried a different quality oil. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GiseleS

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: When this product works, it’s wonderful. The problem for me is when I received my 1st one, is stopped working after I cleaned it. Customer Service was great and replaced it for free. When I cleaned the 2nd one, it also stopped working. And, yes, I know how to clean - I’ve never had a humidifier stop working after cleaning. I’m not ordering a 3rd one, because I don’t have time to continuous reordering a defective product. I have other humidifiers in my home that I’ve had for years, with no issues. DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT (this isn’t a fake review)
customer_reviews.author: Jean_R

customer_reviews.title: I like the option to add essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, it works well. Keeps the air humid but doesn't add heat to the air. I like the option to add essential oils, that makes the room smell nice. However, cleaning it is an absolute pain. It's almost impossible to scrub every corner of the inside unless you have the arms of a 4 year old. Mineral deposits really build up in the inside - apparently using distilled water is the solution, so I'll start giving that a try, but I would imagine it still needs to be cleaned regularly, even with distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: DPAF

customer_reviews.title: not good for midwest
customer_reviews.text: this has to be filled over once per day if you run it on its highest setting. not good for midwest winters
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality, year of experience review
customer_reviews.text: This unit has high capacity which is nice. Sometimes I can get 2 nights out of it during the winter when I need it most. Output is fairly strong. Build quality is decent, it doesn't feel fragile. Although I'm sure if I dropped the tank filled with water it would break, I think that's expected based on the amount of water it holds. My biggest grips with this unit is the noise. It didn't make noise at first. About a year in, it now creates a loud whirring noise while it's operational. Maybe I'll add a video of this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Bananas

customer_reviews.title: Leaks Within Short Time After Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Despite being highly rated amongst other humidifiers, this unit began leaking within the first month of usage. It is quiet and it is powerful, but the leaking water aspect completely negates any possible utility. I am sending this back without replacing; I do no think it is worth it given that it will most likely leak again at some point.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dashiell

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk! Worked for about 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier worked great for about 5 weeks, and then...it stopped working. I received this Oct. 30 and on Dec. 14 it no longer worked. The product comes with a 2 year warranty, we'll see if the company actually honors that. Total waste of my money, at almost $60...this piece of crap humidifier is a total rip off.
customer_reviews.author: julia.a.najera

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE TO EARLIER REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: TWO WEEKS LATER. HAVE TO RETURN TOTALLY USELESS NOW. WOKE UP TO FIND FLOOD ON BEDROOM FLOOR AND RED LIGHT ON UNIT. CLEANED UP THE MESS, EMPTIED THE REMAINING WATER IN THE TANK,CLEANED THE UNIT ,REFILLED THE TANK WITH FRESH WATER. TURNED THE UNIT ON AND INSTANT RED LIGHT AGAIN. TRIED FOR AN HOUR AND GAVE UP AS LEAK STARTED AGAIN. I AM DISABLED AND THIS CAUSED UNNECESSARY WORK. DO NOT BUY THIS UNIT!!! BOUGHT A DIFFERENT BRAND WHICH HAS BEEN WORKING FLAWLESSLY FOR A MONTH CONTINUOUSLY AND MUCH EASIER TO REFILL FROM TOP. WHAT A WASTE.
customer_reviews.author: timbo

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient at all 😥
customer_reviews.text: What I like with this humidifier it's: 1 - Totally silent. 2 - Huge size for water so stay 2-3 nights 3 - The little blue light But I feel really no difference in the room by using it. It's seems like it's not efficient.. I can see the vapor out but that's it. Dryness is the same as without the machine. I had 2 others humidifier and they were efficient but smaller, that's why I wanted to try this one. Also the white cover for water is very hard to open to fill it up. Each time its wet and very hard. I will send it back.
customer_reviews.author: AZ38

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected but has a major issue with the essential oil tray
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 humidifiers. I was stoked about this one though because of the essential oil feature but I think it is a major flaw. First you don’t smell it much unless you add quite a bit in the tray. The tray uses a sponge substance to absorb the oil but here is the major issue. As the oil sits there it can start to smell bad since it has been absorbed into this sponge. It has caused ours to smell like an old gym bag if we run it. I’ve scrubbed every piece down and have Febreezed the essential oil area and soaked the try in soapy water. It smells less but still remains.
customer_reviews.author: Review King

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I would advise against buying this humidifier. It prematurely stopped working a week ago after non-continuous, moderate use in a medium sized bedroom. I was only putting in filtered water. The unit would come on but the ionizing feature to turn the water to mist. no longer works. I was going off of the amount of positive reviews in my decision to purchase this unit over other ones on Amazon but unfortunately my experience with this unit did not yield the same positive experience.
customer_reviews.author: MANGO

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a couple of months!!! Keeps showing red light I've tried everything to get it working again. But nothing. Very disappointed. Horrible product. It leaked water everywhere and didn't fill the room with humidity. It was only dispersed to one location since the machine doesnt have a fan. I cant clean it properly because the hole is too small. And it's pretty hard to fill up. So sad about this. I was so excited to get it. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: kristin angel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't going to write a review but I'm just annoyed at this point. This thing is so hard to carry! No handle, so after filling it up its gonna have water on it and its stupid slippery, better have two hands to carry it and be ready to drip water on the floor! Also the white dust it leaves on everything is so much more then I've ever seen with any similar products. I just would not buy this thing again, I wish i had bought one with a handle, it really makes all the difference in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Tauna Vernon

customer_reviews.title: was great... till it broke
customer_reviews.text: we bought this not even a year ago and the motor has gone out. I have a smaller humidifier I use for my boys when they are under the weather and that is almost 2 years old and still running. That was half the price too. We were a little disappointed and will be shopping around for a new one with allergies/ sinuses going crazy in this house at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Mommymoss

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Broke after not even a month of use. Very disappointed. Am going to return but don't look forward to having to leave the house during what is supposed to be a lockdown in my state to do it. Really wish the product would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: was having severe nose bleeds this winter after my previous humidifier broke and I didn't replace. My old one got "slimy" very quickly and didn't hold a lot. This one holds 8 large cups of water and runs about 24-30 hours on the lowest setting. The lowest setting puts out a very good amount. Hard to handle if you do not hold it by the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Duty

customer_reviews.title: red light
customer_reviews.text: After 6 month of using, the product is not working. The red light is on, even the water is filled. Try wait couple nights, and still the same. Also, when it was working, the carpet and floor would be all wet next morning around the machine. Be aware. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shuang Chen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, we purchased it because our house was so dry that our cat was getting nose bleeds. The vet suggested we get a humidifier so we purchased this one and live it!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Update, the humidifier has stopped working, and it has only been 4 months ###########$55 dollars is alot of money for me, only to last 4 months to the day.######I purchased a cool mist humidifier because it works best for asthma. My cat was diagnosed with asthma this year, and has to be given an inhaler. Due to the cold weather, her flare ups were more often, so thought a humidifier would be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: mel1972

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory  performance. Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed .Little humidity in bedroom 10 x 10. Container sticks to base after every use. Black plastic comes off.Container for oil sticks and sheds black plastic. Smudges on container after every use. It also sticks to surface with sticky substance.Did not turn off once empty. Would return but I am disabled too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these due to good reviews. We live in AZ/very dry climate. Both of these stopped working within 6 months. They were a fog machine when they did work, so disappointing. Don’t make the same mistake I did, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The only good feature I found was the noise level; very quite. this machine does NOT hold a lot of water and there were no instructions as to how much water to pour into it. The instructions show you the blue line level, except you can't see the water filling into the tank until its to late with water overflowing all over your surface. Even worse, the water in the tank only lasts about an hour before the red indictor light comes on to let you know the tank is empty. I've since purchased a humidifier from CVS for half the costs and its totally effective. I would not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: LadyNutt

customer_reviews.title: Company is fraud and will harass if you write a poor review
customer_reviews.text: Update: I am continuously harassed via personal email to change my review. They have been emailing for 1 year now after I have responded to stop contacting me. Way harder to clean than the really common "drop" humidifier you can find at Target. I would not recommend buying because we can't clean completely like we can our other brand. It's got mold and I don't want to breathe mold.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lammons

customer_reviews.title: There are drawbacks!
customer_reviews.text: It drips all over the place. I have to keep a towel by it for when I pick it up out of the base to refill it. Filling it is very awkward because it has no handle. I have to wipe up the trail of water it leaves when I take it to be refilled. It’s a pain. But it is totally silent and so far it hasn’t stopped working or deconstructed and poured water all over the carpet. I’ve only had it for a couple of weeks. It’s June so I can’t tell if it will will humidify the air in my bedroom in winter. I’m hopefull but it is a real nuisance when you have to fill it.
customer_reviews.author: CherylY

customer_reviews.title: Red light issue
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had the same experience that many others are mentioning here with the red light coming on & humidifier not working. My humidifier worked without issue for about four weeks before the red light came on. I tried fully cleaning it a couple times, emptying it out, checking the manual, etc. - all to no avail. It now occasionally works for me but always shut off within 30 minutes & the red light comes back on. Maybe a faulty sensor or something like that. I'd strongly recommend that you do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not Ideal
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a humidifier that didn't look like a humidifier: CHECK! What we got was a humidifier that was a pain to clean and hard to tell if it was clean (the base is black and so is the mold/algae that grows in it) and there area lot of small spaced that are a pain to clean. Additionally, the mist/fog isn't shot out far enough from the unit so when on high-setting, the table it sits on gets wet and is a mess too. We finally wound up donating it to Goodwill and moving on from this product. WOULD NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny B

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...white film on everything
customer_reviews.text: Igore the great reviews. Do not buy! I bought 3 of these and they work fine to put moisture in the air, but they leave a horrible white film over everything. You have to dust and mop at least once a day. I tried all the products on amazon for hard water and nothing works. Buy a humidifier with a filter.
customer_reviews.author: KACP

customer_reviews.title: it's very hard to refill water and use (bad design)
customer_reviews.text: Once you turn it on, it will run all the way until it drain all water (no 1 hour or 3 hour timer). Once it drain all water, you should manual unplug electricity otherwise it will cause damage (manual instruction told you so - this is stupid. Electrical circuit can't switch it off when there's no water?) If you want to refill, you have to flip the tank, open it and use a water bottle to fill in water. Flipping the tank caused water to drop to the base and on the ground (really bad design).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It leaked all over the floor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the excellent reviews...unfortunately, the humidifier leaked all over the floor. I thought I must have either not tightened the lid enough or put it on the base wrong. So I tried it again..nope it leaked the entire full container slowly all over the floor each time. I came home to a huge puddle twice. Back it goes. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Siren

customer_reviews.title: So this humidfier works great. I can't say that it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: So this humidfier works great. I can't say that it doesn't. However, I hate the fact that it has to be on a hard surface and not the floor. Then, it has to be at least a few feet from electronics and from the wall. It's like it needs a table in the middle of the room for itself. I will say, it is quiet and the light on the side is nice. It might go to my son's room though. We have too many electronics and not enough counter space in our bedroom for it.
customer_reviews.author: giosmom

customer_reviews.title: Screeches when empty
customer_reviews.text: Humidifier runs great throughout the night. Living in California our water quality sucks so finding filtered water is a little difficult. This isn't a necessary step, but I hate the idea of all those chemicals in the air while we sleep. If I were to suggest an improvement, I would say an auto shut off. The light currently goes red, then the machine screeches until its turned off if it uses up the water. Keeping it filled isn't a huge issue, but considering I cant tell how full it is without opening it and spilling water all over, it is annoying. Overall it does a good job at putting water into the air.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Park

customer_reviews.title: Good until it quit working but the other one is still working
customer_reviews.text: I bought two due to our house being dry and one of them quit working like a week after I got it but I didn't know how to even return it. It was for my autistic son. If anyone knows who to contact please let me know. I'm my son care taker and dont have the money to keep forking this money out for new ones. Other than that it worked really well for the week I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Stamper

customer_reviews.title: It helps when sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She has a hard time sleeping because of the dry air in the bedroom. She finds that this humidifier has really helped in this area to keep the air moist so that her mouth and nose aren't all dried up in the morning. Others have commented about the mess, or excess water while filling the humidifier. I don't see that as a problem. You are dealing with water. It's not like it's leaking all over while it's being used. I haven't come across that problem. It's nothing I can't deal with. My wife is happy, so I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Gets Slimy Quick
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a little then got gummed up. Fan started making sounds. Not fun to Clean. Customer service wouldn't help
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks and response from company
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while it lasted. Strong mist and loved it to sleep with it. Stopped working after 3 weeks. Wouldn't turn on. Kept it unplugged when not in use as instructed. Strongly disappointed. Missed the 30 day return date so stuck with a dud and parched dry winter skin. sad. so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier works, but it has many design flaws. No humidistat. You can only set how high the output is. You can't set it to go on and off automatically to maintain a desired humidity level. The handle on top is hidden under the artistic looking baffle on top. THis baffle is extremely hard to remove, and drips water everywhere when you do remove it. If you leave the baffle on, it is challenging to place the tank back on the humidifier after refilling it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Two Years, 25 days....
customer_reviews.text: Two Years, 25 days.... That is how long we got out of 1 of 2 units being used nearly 24/7. Warranty expired 25 days ago.... lol Nice units, quiet. CPU size squirrel fan can start buzzing if dust is accumulated on the fans. Causing it to become out of balance. *Hitting it with a 'Can Of Air' to blast it off can help. * Note doing so will most likely void the warranty. * Base unit is easy to clean. Tank unit is a PITA with all the nooks and crannies. It is a routine I loathe doing. For the price point though, it was a good unit. C.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McCrary

customer_reviews.title: Really Loved this unit until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March, 2019 & really loved it until a week ago when it just stopped working. The light just stays red even when the water tank is full so, not sure what happened. With the dry air in winter I need a reliable long lasting humidifier to help with my sinuses. Before purchasing this It took me weeks to read through reviews of many different units. This unit had great reviews & what sold me was that it has a diffuser. Just a little disappointed that it didn’t even last a year. Well now my search continues 😢
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: When flipping container upside down to open and fill residual water falls out of the top, and the vents also fall out. They’re easy to pop back in, it’s just a bit annoying to have to worry about. I also didn’t except this to need to be refilled so often. Running it with a full tank on half power I have to refill every 8 or so hours. I was hoping it would last a day or two without needed to be refilled. Overall I’m not unhappy with the product, but I would have paid more for a better product if I knew how this one operated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying, this is the BEST humidifier I have ever purchased. It's a 2 in 1. Its a humidifier/diffuser all in one. The only downfall is...it doesn't come in a bundle and mine didn't come with the essential oil cover. I had to contact customer service. They were so accommodating. I wish the humidifier would've came with a pack of essential oils all together. Needless to say, that is something you have to purchase separately. It is definitely worth it. You can't be the price. Its quite and it has its own essential oil slot. You don't have to make the bin oily with the water. Water has its own seperate container. Very sleek. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Naaralyn524

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST humidifier I have ever had. It’s quiet and efficient... just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and works but throwing it out already...
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, it was quiet and worked great, so I was happy. But operationally, I don’t like the directional holes on the top, when it’s dry they don’t slide easily at all but it’s not that big of a deal. My biggest issue is it’s impossible to fully clean this thing... so unless you are buying purified or distilled water to pour into it, cleaning is a pain and even then I can’t get it fully clean. There’s a bunch of areas that are hard/impossible to reach. I’m sure someone has come up with some creative way to clean it easier, it just wasn’t me. So it’s just not very easy to own, I’m tossing it.
customer_reviews.author: sventi

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quite, and top knotch customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Service recovery is so important in this consumer world. The seller contacted me, and I explained what was going on. She immediately sent a replacement, which works extremely well. Very satisfied now, I kept it running for 48 hours to test it out, and was very amazed that there was no more water leaks or wet surrounding areas now. Thinking of Ordering another unit again for another room in the house. Pros Extremely quite.Tank extremely moderately large. Mist- clears stuffy nose. Seller I Thankyou very much for the great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: KAY

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier! Difficult to fill if you are elderly or sick.
customer_reviews.text: Great humidifier! My only issue is having to remove the reservoir tank, flip it upside down and fill it with over a gallon of water and flip it back onto the machine. My elderly parents would definitely have a problem with this. It would be great if it was able to be filled without removing the tank! That is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nosey Parker

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable noises
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product within the last week and have used a number of times. Firstly, and less undesirable noise was the water passing into base. Rather than little by little, there seems to be a big "gulp" when base needs water. The first couple of times made me jump a bit as I use in my bedroom at night. Secondly, and most importantly, is the high pitched "machine" noise that the product is already beginning to make. It is very slight, but annoying and the thought that it will increase inevitably leads me to one decision: RETURN and REFUND.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: It's a humidifier...a big one!
customer_reviews.text: After about a half dozen humidifiers, we finally arrived at this one. My wife needs a humidifier, or her sinuses will be dry and she will have headaches. So, it's on the man to fix the problem. This, by far, is the best humidifier that we have every had. Not only that, I don't have to add water every night before bed. It will last for 3 to 4 days on a low setting, so on those days that I forget to fill the humidifier, she won't get mad. There's still water in it! This thing is quiet too. I can't even hear it over the sounds of my wife's snoring. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: T. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Relieves dry nose problems!!!
customer_reviews.text: This humidier totally helped with my daughter's nose bleeding issues. When we started using the heating system for the entire house during this winter season, my daughter started having nose bleeds constantly due to the dry air inside the house. Eversince we started using the humidifier during bedtime in her room, she hasn't complained about having to wake up in the middle of the night to deal with nose bleeds. And using some essential oils to the product gives an added benefit of her room smelling great. Great product overall, I would highly recommend it just for helping my daughter out with her problems .
customer_reviews.author: yabaaz

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fill
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, Poor design as it is difficult to fill with water. you need to take the tank off the lower unit, then unscrew a cap which is on the underside of the tank, fill with water, screw the cap back on, then turn it over and blindly fit it back on the lower unit. Other humidifiers just have an opening at the top you can simply pour water in to refill. Also, seems a little flimsy, questionable quality and there is an annoying blue light on the tank that lights up the room at night.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wilson

customer_reviews.title: AC AND LUNG KILLER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They say this will run 5 days and nights with one fill on low. Not true we fill it every 2 nights. We only run it from 6pm until 10am 2x them its empty. Pain in the butt. Might return it. This product caused mold in our AC unit. There was no warning about this. We consulted 2 AC experts and they confirm the mold happened because of the humidifier. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works well, does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Got this to alleviate nighttime sneezing from allergies. Seems to work pretty well. EDIT: Lowering review to 3 stars because of a suspicious card I got in the mail, offering a $20 for a review, which I'd already posted the day before (when the card was in the mail). I don't like these kinds of practices by companies on Amazon. Even the email address on the card (giftdepartment@outlook.com) seemed suspicious. So, either the company selling this is doing this, or their data is not secure, and someone else knows I bought a humidifier (it said so on the card).
customer_reviews.author: The Grokker

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier ever
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many humidifiers over the years due to issues related to allergies. The Everlasting Comfort Humidifier is, by far, the best, the most quiet and the most affordable I have ever used. As important, is the great customer service that comes with it. I had a problem with the Everlasting Comfort humidifier bought through Amazon some time ago, a problem that, frankly, I likely caused. I emailed customer service and explained the problem. Rebecca, the service rep, immediately offered a refund or a new unit. I chose the latter and it arrived the following day. I highly recommend this humidifier and I highly praise the company that sells it. K. Knight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking problems refund made it
customer_reviews.text: Is not bad machine but, I got one with some leaking they refund the money but I won’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Angie Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier works well and is quiet. My only complaint, and this applies to most humidifiers like this. The tank is designed in a way that when you remove it to fill, the shape of the tank is very awkward. Water drips all over the place when you turn it over to fill. It won't site upside down without falling over. There is a cap over the hole where the mist comes out that falls off when you turn it upside down. It seems like the tanks could be designed in a way that is a little more practical. It does work well, and I would recommend it. But it could be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: mr97

customer_reviews.title: Look no further; buy this one
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier goes way beyond expectations! I've gone through 3 humidifiers and have loathed them all. One leaked, one was weak, one was too big, and so it went, until this one. It is the perfect footprint and profile. Sleek, but not boring. It delivers a pretty good plume of steam, even at 1/3 of the power dial. The best thing about this is also maybe not good for those who like white noise. This unit runs virtually silently. It makes no sound and doesn't even vibrate the surface it's sitting on. I highly recommend this for the picky and not-easily-impressed among you.
customer_reviews.author: Olivetoes

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a few months And then summer time I put it away since I didn’t need it. My daughter recently has been sick with colds so I used it the first night and it leaked all over my floors. The same thing the second night and I put less water in to make sure it wasn’t me overfilling it. Now I use it with a tray under it to catch the water but it consistently leaks water. What do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Preety Saini

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a few months
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted one season. I'm using it to keep my music room moist. Last season it worked great to keep the 13' x 13' room at a good level. But this year it worked for a few days then nothing. Trying to find out how to use the warranty as it seems I've misplaced the manual...
customer_reviews.author: The Copelands

customer_reviews.title: Stooped working after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I would like for you to honor your warranty and replace this item. Inpurxhased in Feb of 2019 and it has just stopped working. No air flow and the light remains res now. No noise at all anymore. This is just stopped working in its entirety. **UPDATED** The vendor immediately replied and sent a replacement. Very much appreciate the warranty and prompt support! Aside from the product having stopped working out of nowhere, I have updated the rating based on the support and hopeful the new product will work consistently!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of vapor/mist
customer_reviews.text: To put it quickly, I had had a raspy newborn & decided to purchase a vicks one...big mistake because there was hardly any mist! So that was immediately was replaced with Everlasting comforts humidifier. Thanks to some quick research I figured this is what I was looking for. It's easily taken apart for convenient maintenance & cleaning. It also comes in black or white with a directional spout for the vapor... And boy is there vapor! This thing bellows out vapor/mist. And now I'm a happy parent with a better sounding child.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Macuska

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this humidifier really is sooo soo quiet and it works great. It really helped me with my dry mouth /coughing issues at night when I sleep. When we have the heater on at night it really dries the air in my bedroom so sleeping was always an issue for me, I have to use my dry mouth spray or drink water every few hours at night. The first night I had this unit on, on a low/mild mist setting it really kept the air moist and my mouth was NOT as dry, great improvement! It was still going this morning, nice big water tank. great investment
customer_reviews.author: SJ Gal

customer_reviews.title: Everlasting comfort humidifier is the best yet!
customer_reviews.text: We have had many humidifiers over the last 10 to 15 years. This everlasting comfort machine is by far the very best. It is quiet, it is efficient and it’s also very effective allowing us to breathe humidified air versus dry air from the gas heating in our home. We have purchased a second one to be delivered today. Great product! We were so impressed with the first humidifier that we bought a second one for the living room. This is also so quiet it does not interfere with conversations or watching tv. We are very pleased with both humidifiers and recommend them as the best we have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Processes

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but broke after a month or two of use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April 2019 and ran it for a couple months, it's very nice and quiet when it works. Drained the water and hadn't touched it until this October 2019. It ran once, I filled up the tank, the light is stuck on red and no mist. Went through their troubleshooting, still nothing. My water isn't hard, so that's not the issue, just nothing happening. The lights are on but nobody is home so to speak. Emailed the manufacturer and they'd like me to go through the same troubleshooting again (doesn't take long). They're willing to replace or refund. We shall see how long the replacement lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, easy to clean, & large capacity
customer_reviews.text: My son had his tonsils/adenoids out, and because it’s winter in MN, I needed to add some humidity to his room. The unit is very quiet! It has a large tank, that I’d run at 1/2 steam, lasted 36 hours. It’s nice there is the optional essential oil tray, and that the unit is very easy to take apart, fill, clean, etc. It doesn’t “spit” and I’ve noticed no wet residue on the furniture it’s sitting on, or the floor surrounding. You can aim the steam in one or two directions simultaneously. I looked at many units, and I’m glad I chose this one. The 2 year warranty also set my mind at ease! Happy humidifying!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mbvolley21

customer_reviews.title: I Like This Humidifier A lot
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the humidifier performed very well, with its low noise level and high output. There are two controls, with one being a variable mist intensity control, and the other, a LED button. The latter illuminates the water-level view-port on the side of the unit, which could also be used as a night light. The instructions stipulated that distilled water, or water with a low mineral content should be used. But, I just used tap water, due to its low water-hardness level. I gave the humidifier four stars, only because I found that filling the water tank from the bottom to be a mild chore. Even so, I bought a second humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: BryanOB

customer_reviews.title: 4 of 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday all day and night. We like that the mist can be pointed in a particular direction and the quantity is also adjustable. The only thing I don't like is that the top isn't flat, when refilling it cannot be set down flat because the top is curved. It takes a minute or two to fill and can get heavy. You cannot set it down to put the lid on without working to balance it at the same time. I like that it is black, doesn't leak, and had a fill indicator on the side and on/off lights. Would buy again unless I found one easier to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good little humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier couldn't be more simple. Fill up the tank and turn the dial to your preference. A blue LED lights up on the side to see how full it is. My boyfriend's house has been really dry with using the heat this winter. This came at a perfect time, because his son got sick this weekend. It made a significant difference for his nasal passages, but it made a noticeable difference for us too. We filled it at about 1pm. It's been 9 hours on high and still going strong! Update: lasts a couple days on low. One of the best products I've ever ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, waste of money, becomes defective
customer_reviews.text: Well apparently the red light of death came on, of course soon after the 3 month return window ended. Will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This humidifier is a MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this humidifier so much I bought 2 more. Powerful, large tank, directional flow so you can direct it away from wood furniture, super quiet, easy to clean, auto shut off, scented oil compartment....what's not to like. Now where can I get new pads for the oil compartment? Even if you clean the pad it retains rhe scent of previous oil. Would purchase fresh pads if I can. If artificial heat dries up your nasal passage you will never regret this purchase. Great for pets too...never mind your skin. Absolutely love this sleek humidifier...best one I have purchased to date.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, efficient unit...just got tired of having to take the reservoir off to refill...thought of drilling a hole in the top for filling! Seems like most units are similarly designed. My only negative. Bought this because it had one of the highest ratings. Don't think you'll go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Rick

customer_reviews.title: Is good. Does what is says. Four stars only because I'm beginning to think better of evaporative humidifiers are more effective
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a fair amount of water. Good for a room. I have had it for several weeks and it is still quiet. Some of the ultrasonic humidifiers get noisy. I expect several seasons out of this. Fairly easy to clean. I bought three Vic Tsing Whole house humidifiers for 1/2 the amount of this. I should have bought more of these. Two of those got noisy. This puts out more water and stores more. Really is a better deal
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Big

customer_reviews.title: Huge humidifier that needs refilling only twice a week
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier has a huge water tank. While it is a little difficult to fill it up, once it is filled, you dont need to refill again for another 4-5 days. You can adjust the amount of sonic mist spray that is coming out of it. The mist can be directed at two different angles. It also has a blue light inside the water tank to see the water level. Cleaning once a month should be enough. So far, I dont notice any red gunk. Very good humidifier and highly recommend it for my friends
customer_reviews.author: PNW Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Only  a humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be able to smell essential oil so very disappointed. I have a very small humidifier that allows the oil to be put in the water. This one makes the oil go on the side and doesn't smell at all. I am afraid putting oil in the water would make it break.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints for now. It works well as it should be. The tank is big enough so it doesn’t run out of water in one night. It’s easy as there is not many button or options (there is only a knob to turn from min to max, and a button for led light). The design is good and simple, nothing fancy. It’s stable. I’ll update if there is any problems with it. So far, we have been through more than 4 humidifiers. They usually have problems after a while of using, but so far this one still works well.
customer_reviews.author: Krist Wongsuphasawat

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I received this product to exchange a honest feedback. The package has arrived quickly after a day of ordering. The humidifier is light weighted and easy to use it. It's more quiet than the ones that I am currently using.It can adjust the intensity and there is a little tray to put the essential oil, which is a plus. The tank is huge, and has a very strong mist which moisturize the place quicker. Usually humidifier cant last longer than a year, hope this one can. Will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tall sister

product_meta.title: Everlasting Comfort Humidifiers for Bedroom (6L) - Humidifier with Essential Oil Tray (Black)
feature_bullets: COOL MIST HUMIDIFIER - Features a 6 liter (1.6 gallons) tank, with a super high mist output. Our ultrasonic humidifier for bedrooms works in rooms up to 500 square feet and lasts 50 straight hours. This makes our air humidifier ideal for large rooms and is the perfect room essential for the house, apartment, office, nursery, or college dorm.

ESSENTIAL OIL TRAY - More than just a humidifier, we included a tray for essential oils. Your new oil diffuser humidifier circulates the oils into the cool mist, giving you a clean, pure, and fresh smelling aroma. Ideal for creating an aromatherapy experience you’ll love. It also makes an excellent humidifier for babies and features a blue LED night light.

HELPS REDUCE ILLNESSES - Decrease the risk of illness by keeping the humidity in any room above 43. A humidifier in the bedroom or nursery provides adults and babies with a good night's sleep. By diffusing moisture into the dry air, our humidifier helps reduce coughs, sinus issues, and snoring. And find comfort in the fact that our humidifier is ETL safety certified.

AUTO SHUT OFF, WHISPER QUIET - The vaporizer humidifier automatically shuts off when out of water. This helps prevents damage to the unit and keeps you safe. Best of all, our home humidifiers are nearly silent, making them the perfect humidifier for baby rooms and bedrooms.

NO EXPENSIVE FILTERS NEEDED - Our ultrasonic humidifier design is filterless, eliminating the need for expensive replacement filters. IMPORTANT: Running the humidifier in humid conditions can cause water accumulation on surfaces. Use a hydrometer to monitor humidity levels. It is recommended to keep humidity between 40 and 60 percent. Exceeding 60 percent humidity can cause water accumulation and can damage wood, electronics, and other surfaces.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars12,112 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 2 Year Replacement Guarantee. If you have any issues at all with your Everlasting Comfort Humidifier, then contact us and we will issue a free replacement.
